page.title: 17LEISURE IN SOUTHALL
page.content: Lots of people go visiting very often. That has always been popular. Many people in Southall spend a great deal of time watching T.V. Usually people like watching comedy series, serials and sports coverage. People also use T.V. sets for watching video films (particularly Indian films) and also for computer and video games. Some people play cards and board games such as chess. Reading is quite popular too, That is why the local library is used a lot. Sport is one of the things people do in their spare time. It includes swimming, Tennis in the park or at a club, gymnastics, football and cricket. There is fishing in the local canal,ponds and rivers. Roach, perch, tench, carp, rudd, bream and dace are all caught within a few miles.
